attributes.title: Maha Shivaratri Special Satsang - 17th February, 2015
attributes.description:
Special Maha Shivaratri Satsang of Paramahamsa Nithyananda delivered on 17th February, 2015

Maha Shivaratri Message In Brief
Bidadi, 17 February 2015

Shivoham!
Whatever you assume as you - aham . Whatever you perceive as you - aham. THAT decides your desires, your goals, your fears, your excitement, your passion, your intensity. EVERYTHING is decided by what you perceive as aham - I. Understand, what you perceive as I, if that itself is a delusion, everything will be a delusion and you will feel cheated by you. YOU feeling cheated by you is the worst suffering that you can experience in life. Whatever you perceive as aham other than Shivoham is delusion. Waking up from that delusion is possible this night.

Every dream - unconscious, subconscious, lucid, whatever - weakens you. Weakens your consciousness. Master is also a dream. But he is a dream who wakes you up. Even amidst your delusion, if you meet the master you will wake up!

This night is the time to wake up! You spent all your nights in dreaming and sleeping. But this night is not for dreaming or sleeping. This night is for you to wake up from ALL the dreams.

Let Mahadeva lead everyone into awakening. Shiva! Shiva! Shiva! Let the whole universe experience Mahadeva! Experience Shivoham! Experience Kundalini Awakening!
